description: Overview for VictoriaMetrics vmauth v1.80.0 or higher

panels.description: Shows if the last configuration update was successful. "Not Ok" means there was an unsuccessful attempt to update the configuration due to some error. Check the log for details.
panels.title: Config update

panels.description: Shows the total number of users defined at configuration file.
panels.title: Users count

panels.description: Shows the rate of request errors.
panels.title: Errors rate

panels.description: Shows percent utilization of  per concurrent requests capacity.
panels.title: User concurrent requests usage

panels.description: Shows the rate of rejected requests by a reason.
panels.title: Requests rejected rate

panels.description:
The number of concurrent connections processed by vmauth reached one of limits. Possible solutions:
- increase global limit with flag -maxConcurrentRequests
- increase limit with flag: -maxConcurrentPerUserRequests for all users or with config option `max_concurrent_requests` per user.
- deploy additional vmauth replicas
- check requests latency at backend service and allocate resources to it if needed
panels.title: Concurrent limit reached

panels.description: Shows duration in seconds of user requests by quantile.
panels.title: User requests duration

panels.description:
Percentage of used memory (resident).
The application's performance will significantly degrade when memory usage is close to 100%.
panels.title: RSS memory % usage ($instance)

panels.description:
Shows the percentage of open file descriptors compared to the limit set in the OS.
Reaching the limit of open files can cause various issues and must be prevented.

See how to change limits here https://medium.com/@muhammadtriwibowo/set-permanently-ulimit-n-open-files-in-ubuntu-4d61064429a
panels.title: Open FDs ($instance)

targets.expr: sum(flag{is_set="true", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}) by(job, instance, name, value)

panels.description: Shows number of generated  error and warning messages in  logs. Non-zero value may be a sign of connectivity or missconfiguration errors.
panels.title: Log errors

title: VictoriaMetrics - vmauth
